targets.query: from(bucket: "ha_events") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /ha_/) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "sensor") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] =~ /.*(power|energy|watt).*/) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["state"] =~ /^[0-9.]+$/) |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: float(v: r.state)})) |> last() |> yield(name: "Current Power")

from(bucket: "ha_events") |> range(start: -7d) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /ha_/) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "sensor") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] =~ /.*(power|energy|watt).*/) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["state"] =~ /^[0-9.]+$/) |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: float(v: r.state)})) |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false) |> yield(name: "Hourly Power")

from(bucket: "ha_events") |> range(start: -24h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /ha_/) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "sensor") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] =~ /.*(power|energy|watt).*/) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["state"] =~ /^[0-9.]+$/) |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: float(v: r.state)})) |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false) |> group(columns: ["entity_id"]) |> mean() |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true) |> limit(n: 20) |> yield(name: "Device Power")
